about_the_game:
In Space Hero: Intergalactic Titan you play as a space marine sent to various planets with the goal of eradicating its alien population. In this top-down 2D "bullet-heaven" you must survive an alien onslaught for 15 minutes to complete your mission.

Core Gameplay

  • Kill aliens and collect their orbs to gain experience.
  • Upon leveling up, you may choose between three randomly selected ability cards.
  • During each run you are allowed six damage abilities and one utility ability.

Increase your power

  • Killing enemies fills your Token Meter.
  • Filling the Token Meter completely will spawn an Upgrade Token near the player.
  • Bosses drop additional Upgrade Tokens.
  • Spend Upgrade Tokens between runs to buy permanent character upgrades, ability upgrades, and ability mods.
  • Token meter progress is saved between runs.

Customize your playstyle

  • Ability Mods allow you to customize your playstyle.
  • Become a glass cannon, speed demon, sturdy tank, jack-of-all-trades, and more.
  • Ability Mods also have a small chance to drop while playing.
  • Playing on a higher difficulty level increases the chance that Ability Mods will drop.

Join Us On Discord!

short_description: A top-down "bullet-heaven" roguelite where you play as a futuristic space marine. Use a variety of damage and utility abilities in your attempt to survive. Earn tokens to spend on permanent character upgrades, ability upgrades, and ability mods that allow you to customize your playstyle.
